https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xPb5lzEou8CZPy9bV0ssbL146gY.jpg Asli and Saeed fall in love in the mid-1990s. Although Asli’s mother is against their relationship, they secretly get married. Then he disappears. A sensitive love story that recounts how Saeed changes Asli’s life – before the entire world is shaken. Copilot
